meanings.definition: Having a roof with two slopes on all sides and dormer windows
meanings.sent1: The mansarded house looked unique with its sloping roof and dormer windows.
meanings.sent2: The mansarded building stood out in the neighborhood due to its distinct roof design.
meanings.sent3: The mansarded roof made the house look like a charming cottage from a fairy tale.
meanings.sent4: The mansarded structure resembled a quaint dollhouse with its sloping roof and small windows.
meanings.sent5: The mansarded architecture created a cozy atmosphere inside the home.

meanings.definition: To furnish with a mansard roof
meanings.sent1: They mansarded the old building to give it a more modern look.
meanings.sent2: The construction crew mansarded the house to enhance its curb appeal.
meanings.sent3: I wonder if they will mansard the entire neighborhood next!
meanings.sent4: The decision to mansard the office building was met with mixed reactions.
meanings.sent5: Mansarding the structure transformed it into a stylish and elegant space.
